name: CloneArena - Ludum Dare 47
description:
Made For Ludum Dare : 47

  • If you do not hear music, refresh the page.
  • Zoom in using your browser to enlarge the game. (you can do this for all itch browser games)
  • Try the Windows Version for best experience.

Objective: Kill as many monsters as you can. The more you kill, the harder it gets.

Side Quest: Obtain the guns scattered around the map

Controls: 

  • WASD to move Space to Jump
  • R to restart... with a twist
  • F to restart and kill all clones
  • Left-click to shoot
  • Right-click to zoom out

Made Using GameMaker Studio 2, BFXR

Music: Chasing Time - SYBS
